document.full_text: mohamed bin hammam is facing an ethics investigation just days before his attempt to unseat sepp blatter as fifa president after a report alleging possible bribery rocked the election campaign on wednesday.
document.title: fifa to investigate warner, bin hammam
lines_and_colors: mohamed bin hammam is facing an ethics investigation just days before his attempt to unseat sepp blatter as fifa president after a report alleging possible bribery rocked the election campaign on wednesday.
